verses.verse: Now <WG1161> concerning <WG4012> the <WG3588> collection <WG3048> for <WG1519> the <WG3588> saints, <WG40> as <WG5618> I have given order <WG1299> to the <WG3588> churches <WG1577> of Galatia, <WG1053> even <WG2532> so <WG3779> do <WG4160> ye. <WG5210>

Upon the first <WG2596> <WG3391> day of the week <WG4521> let every one <WG1538> of you <WG5216> lay <WG5087> by <WG3844> him <WG1438> in store, <WG2343> as <WG3748> <WG302> God hath prospered <WG2137> him, that <WG2443> there be <WG1096> no <WG3361> gatherings <WG3048> when <WG3752> I come. <WG2064>

And <WG1161> when <WG3752> I come, <WG3854> whomsoever <WG3739> <WG1437> ye shall approve <WG1381> by <WG1223> your letters, <WG1992> them <WG5128> will I send <WG3992> to bring <WG667> your <WG5216> liberality <WG5485> unto <WG1519> Jerusalem. <WG2419>
And <WG1161> if <WG1437> it be <WG5600> meet <WG514> that I go also, <WG2504> <WG4198> they shall go <WG4198> with <WG4862> me. <WG1698>
Now <WG1161> I will come <WG2064> unto <WG4314> you, <WG5209> when <WG3752> I shall pass through <WG1330> Macedonia: <WG3109> for <WG1063> I do pass through <WG1330> Macedonia. <WG3109>

And <WG1161> it may be <WG5177> that I will abide, <WG3887> yea, <WG2228> and <WG2532> winter <WG3914> with <WG4314> you, <WG5209> that <WG2443> ye <WG5210> may bring me on my journey <WG4311> <WG3165> whithersoever <WG3757> <WG1437> I go. <WG4198>

For <WG1063> I will <WG2309> not <WG3756> see <WG1492> you <WG5209> now <WG737> by the way; <WG1722> <WG3938> but <WG1161> I trust <WG1679> to tarry <WG1961> a while <WG5100> <WG5550> with <WG4314> you, <WG5209> if <WG1437> the <WG3588> Lord <WG2962> permit. <WG2010>
But <WG1161> I will tarry <WG1961> at <WG1722> Ephesus <WG2181> until <WG2193> Pentecost. <WG4005>
For <WG1063> a great <WG3173> door <WG2374> and <WG2532> effectual <WG1756> is opened <WG455> unto me, <WG3427> and <WG2532> there are many <WG4183> adversaries. <WG480>

Now <WG1161> if <WG1437> Timothy <WG5095> come, <WG2064> see <WG991> that <WG2443> he may be <WG1096> with <WG4314> you <WG5209> without fear: <WG870> for <WG1063> he worketh <WG2038> the <WG3588> work <WG2041> of the Lord, <WG2962> as <WG5613> I <WG1473> also <WG2532> do.

Let no <WG3361> man <WG5100> therefore <WG3767> despise <WG1848> him: <WG846> but <WG1161> conduct him forth <WG4311> <WG846> in <WG1722> peace, <WG1515> that <WG2443> he may come <WG2064> unto <WG4314> me: <WG3165> for <WG1063> I look for <WG1551> him <WG846> with <WG3326> the <WG3588> brethren. <WG80>

<WG1161> As touching <WG4012> our brother <WG80> Apollos, <WG625> I greatly <WG4183> desired <WG3870> him <WG846> to <WG2443> come <WG2064> unto <WG4314> you <WG5209> with <WG3326> the <WG3588> brethren: <WG80> but <WG2532> his will <WG2307> was <WG2258> not at all <WG3843> <WG3756> to <WG2443> come <WG2064> at this time; <WG3568> but <WG1161> he will come <WG2064> when <WG3752> he shall have convenient time. <WG2119>
Watch <WG1127> ye, stand fast <WG4739> in <WG1722> the <WG3588> faith, <WG4102> quit you like men, <WG407> be strong. <WG2901>
Let all your things <WG3956> <WG5216> be done <WG1096> with <WG1722> charity. <WG26>

<WG1161> I beseech <WG3870> you, <WG5209> brethren, <WG80> ye (know <WG1492> the <WG3588> house <WG3614> of Stephanas, <WG4734> that <WG3754> it is <WG2076> the firstfruits <WG536> of Achaia, <WG882> and <WG2532> that they have addicted <WG5021> themselves <WG1438> to <WG1519> the ministry <WG1248> of the <WG3588> saints,) <WG40>
That <WG2443> <WG2532> ye <WG5210> submit yourselves unto <WG5293> such, <WG5108> and <WG2532> to every one <WG3956> that helpeth with <WG4903> us, and <WG2532> laboreth. <WG2872>

<WG1161> I am glad <WG5463> of <WG1909> the <WG3588> coming <WG3952> of Stephanas <WG4734> and <WG2532> Fortunatus <WG5415> and <WG2532> Achaicus: <WG883> for <WG3754> that which was lacking <WG5303> on your part <WG5216> they <WG3778> have supplied. <WG378>
For <WG1063> they have refreshed <WG373> my <WG1699> spirit <WG4151> and <WG2532> yours: <WG5216> therefore <WG3767> acknowledge <WG1921> ye them that are such. <WG5108>

The <WG3588> churches <WG1577> of Asia <WG773> salute <WG782> you. <WG5209> Aquila <WG207> and <WG2532> Priscilla <WG4252> salute <WG782> you <WG5209> much <WG4183> in <WG1722> the Lord, <WG2962> with <WG4862> the <WG3588> church <WG1577> that is in <WG2596> their <WG848> house. <WG3624>
All <WG3956> the <WG3588> brethren <WG80> greet <WG782> you. <WG5209> Greet <WG782> ye one another <WG240> with <WG1722> a holy <WG40> kiss. <WG5370>
The <WG3588> salutation <WG783> of me Paul <WG3972> with mine own <WG1699> hand. <WG5495>
If any man <WG1536> love <WG5368> not <WG3756> the <WG3588> Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ, <WG5547> let him be <WG2277> Anathema <WG331> Maranatha. <WG3134>
The <WG3588> grace <WG5485> of our Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> be with <WG3326> you. <WG5216>
My <WG3450> love <WG26> be with <WG3326> you <WG5216> all <WG3956> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus. <WG2424> Amen. <WG281>
